content.en: Induction heating optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the control and performance of induction heating systems. These algorithms, such as robust control, H∞ control, adaptive control, and intelligent control, aim to overcome challenges in controlling induction heating equipment with load variations, improve dynamic response, accurately estimate power-frequency function, enhance impedance matching, and optimize power supply. By implementing these algorithms, researchers hope to achieve better efficiency, adaptability, and performance in induction heating systems.
content.da: Induktionsopvarmningsoptimering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre styringen og ydeevnen af induktionsopvarmningssystemer. Disse algoritmer, som robust kontrol, H∞ kontrol, adaptiv kontrol og intelligent kontrol, sigter mod at overvinde udfordringer i styringen af induktionsopvarmningsudstyr med belastningsvariationer, forbedre dynamisk respons, præcist estimere effekt-frekvens funktion, forbedre impedansmatching og optimere strømforsyning. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer håber forskere at opnå bedre effektivitet, tilpasningsevne og ydeevne i induktionsopvarmningssystemer.
